org.apache.xalan.lib.sql
Class QueryParameter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.xalan.lib.sql.QueryParameter
public class QueryParameter
extends java.lang.Object

The Query Parameter is a container class that is used to hold the Parameter information. The Xconnection will maintain a LinkedList of these parameters and will pass them in the the pquery.
